name: FocusedBinding
desc: A convenience property wrapper for observing and automatically unwrapping state bindings from the focused view or one of its ancestors.

items.name: init(KeyPath<FocusedValues, Binding<Value>?>)
items.desc: A new property wrapper for the given key path.

items.name: var projectedValue: Binding<Value?>
items.desc: A binding to the optional value.

items.name: var wrappedValue: Value?
items.desc: The unwrapped value for the focus key given the current scope and state of the focused view hierarchy.
